data_table.description: This data table contains Social Network data for Original and Offspring cohorts that has been reviewed through 2008. The time interval includes Original Cohort exams 12, 16, 19, 21, 23, 24, 26, 29 and Offspring Cohort exams 1 - 8. Included are variables that describe the relationship of the ego and alter (n=1 variable), the dates and reasons the tie was initiated or severed (n=4 variables), the distance between the ego and alter (n=8 variables), and the Treiman occupational prestige score for the ego and the alter (n=16 variables).

variable.name: ALTERTYPE
variable.description: DESCRIBES THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN EGO AND ALTER
variable.value: CO-WORKER WHO IS NOT A RELATIVE
NOMINATED FRIEND WHO IS NOT A RELATIVE
NOMINATED FRIEND WHO IS NOT A RELATIVE
NEXT DOOR NEIGHBOR WHO IS NOT A RELATIVE
NEXT DOOR NEIGHBOR WHO IS A RELATIVE
NON-RELATIVE NEIGHBORS WITHIN 100 METERS OF EGO
RELATIVE NEIGHBORS WITHIN 100 METERS OF EGO
NON-RELATIVE NEIGHBORS WITHIN 25 METERS OF EGO
RELATIVE NEIGHBORS WITHIN 25 METERS OF EGO
NOMINATED RELATIVE WHO IS NOT A RELATIVE
NOMINATED RELATIVE WHO IS A RELATIVE
NON-RELATIVE NEIGHBORS LIVING AT THE SAME ADDRESS
RELATIVE NEIGHBORS LIVING AT THE SAME ADDRESS

variable.name: CAUSEINIT
variable.description: REASON TIE WAS INITIATED
variable.value: THE ALTER IS NAMED BY THE EGO

variable.name: CAUSESEVERED
variable.description: REASON TIE WAS SEVERED
variable.value: EGO AND ALTER DIED AT SAME TIME
ALTER WAS NO LONGER NAMED BY THE EGO

variable.name: DISTMI1
variable.description: DISTANCE IN MILES BETWEEN THE EGO AND ALTER AT START OF WAVE 1 (FOR OFFSPRING AND ORIGINAL ALTERS ONLY)
variable.comment: This variable corresponds to Offspring cohort exam 1 and Original cohort exam 12.

variable.name: DISTMI2
variable.description: DISTANCE IN MILES BETWEEN THE EGO AND ALTER AT START OF WAVE 2 (FOR OFFSPRING AND ORIGINAL ALTERS ONLY)
variable.comment: This variable corresponds to Offspring cohort exam 2 and Original cohort exam 16.

variable.name: DISTMI3
variable.description: DISTANCE IN MILES BETWEEN THE EGO AND ALTER AT START OF WAVE 3 (FOR OFFSPRING AND ORIGINAL ALTERS ONLY)
variable.comment: This variable corresponds to Offspring cohort exam 3 and Original cohort exam 19.

variable.comment: This variable corresponds to Offspring cohort exam 4 and Original cohort exam 21.

variable.description: DISTANCE IN MILES BETWEEN THE EGO AND ALTER AT START OF WAVE 5 (FOR OFFSPRING AND ORIGINAL ALTERS ONLY)

variable.description: DISTANCE IN MILES BETWEEN THE EGO AND ALTER AT START OF WAVE 8 (FOR OFFSPRING AND ORIGINAL ALTERS ONLY)
variable.comment: This variable corresponds to Offspring cohort exam 8 and Original cohort exam 29.

variable.name: SPELLBEGIN
variable.description: NUMBER OF MONTHS BETWEEN AN ARBITRARY DATE AND THE DATE THE TIE WAS INITIATED

variable.name: SPELLEND
variable.description: NUMBER OF MONTHS BETWEEN AN ARBITRARY DATE AND THE DATE THE TIE WAS SEVERED

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: FRAMINGHAM HEART STUDY COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: alteridtype
variable.description: ALTER COHORT IDENTIFIER
variable.comment: Alters can be from any FHS cohort group.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: FRAMINGHAM HEART STUDY PARTICIPANT SHARe ID NUMBER

variable.name: sharealterid
variable.description: ALTER SHARe ID NUMBER
